item.title: Aurora
item.description: Related Notes AWS Wiki Relational Database Service Aurora Key Differences Compared to RDS Aurora is hosted within RDS, but it has a different enough architecture that it deserves a dedicated page.

item.title: DynamoDB
item.description: Related Notes AWS Wiki DAX - DynamoDB Accelerator DynamoDB The partition key portion of a table’s primary key determines the logical partitions in which a table’s data is stored.
